pages.text: When wearing $(item)Soulstrider's armor$(), a magical botanist can feel dark energy surging in them. While this armor can be repaired like its $(l:items/sky_armor)counterparts$(), it also provides a $(thing)set bonus$(): When wearing every piece of the armor (or swapping the chestplate for an $(item)Elytra$()), upon being struck, the armor causes all nearby enemies to fuse with the ground for a few seconds, causing them to $(thing)stand completely still$().
